name: TRAINING PLAN
description: The overarching program that guides a user's running journey, adapting to their cycle and race goals.

about.definition: A structured schedule of workouts tailored to a specific race goal and user physiology.
about.purpose: To provide a roadmap for the user to achieve their race goal while respecting their hormonal health.
about.dependencySummary: Depends on User Profile and Race Date. Contains multiple Cycle Phases and Sessions.

instances.exampleInstances: Spring Marathon Training 2026, 5K Couch to 5K, Post-Partum Return to Run

name: CYCLE PHASE
description: A distinct period within the menstrual cycle characterized by specific hormonal profiles and physiological capabilities.

about.definition: A biological time window (Follicular, Ovulatory, Luteal, Menstrual) dictating training readiness.
about.purpose: To contextualize training intensity and recovery needs based on biology.
about.dependencySummary: Part of a Cycle. Influences Training Sessions.

name: RUNNER
description: The user profile containing physiological data, preferences, and training history.

about.definition: The central entity representing the human user of the application.
about.purpose: To store persistent physiological data and preferences that drive the personalization algorithms.
about.dependencySummary: Parent to all Plans and Cycles. Independent entity.

instances.exampleInstances: Jane Doe, Elite Marathoner, Post-Partum Mom

name: TRAINING SESSION
description: A single unit of physical activity prescribed within a plan.

about.definition: An individual workout event with specific duration, intensity, and type.
about.purpose: To prescribe specific training stimuli and track execution.
about.dependencySummary: Belongs to a Training Plan. Influenced by Cycle Phase (Hydration/Intensity).

instances.exampleInstances: Long Run 16k, Interval Session 8x400m, Rest Day

name: RACE
description: A specific event or goal that a training plan targets.

about.definition: A competitive or personal running event with a fixed date and distance.
about.purpose: To provide the anchor and motivation for a Training Plan.
about.dependencySummary: Anchors a Training Plan. Independent of Cycle (but performance is affected by it).
